meanings.definition: A person who depends on someone else for support or sustenance.
meanings.sent1: My sister and I are dependants on our parents for food and shelter.
meanings.sent2: The company provides health insurance for all employees and their dependants.
meanings.sent3: The dependants at the zoo were the animals waiting for their caretakers to feed them.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the young saplings were like dependants relying on the older trees for protection.
meanings.sent5: The orphanage took care of many dependants who had no one else to rely on.

meanings.definition: A child or other relative to whom one contributes support.
meanings.sent1: She sends money to her dependants back in her hometown every month.
meanings.sent2: The grandparents were happy to have all their dependants gathered for a family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The dependants at the family picnic were the kids eagerly waiting for the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The small island was like a dependant relying on the mainland for supplies.
meanings.sent5: The elderly couple had many dependants who visited them regularly for care and companionship.
